LanguageData.AmmoHarpoonArrowPack.label: Arrow pack
LanguageData.AmmoTrashBombsPack.label: Trash bomb
LanguageData.AmmoTrashBombsPack.description: A large ball with a powerful magnet inside and surrounded by all sorts of rubbish. If you deactivate the magnet, then the fragments fly apart in all directions, making holes all around.
